src:
Aji Santoso Dipastikan Jalani Debut pada Laga Persebaya vs Tira Persikabo
06 Nov 2019, 11:16 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pelatih baru Persebaya Surabaya, Aji Santoso, dipastikan akan menjalani debut pada laga melawan Tira Persikabo, Sabtu (9/11/2019). Proses pendaftaran juru taktik asal Kepanjen, Kabupaten Malang itu tidak menemui kendala.
Mantan pelatih Persela Lamongan tersebut bahkan langsung disahkan oleh PT Liga Indonesia Baru, beberapa jam setelah meneken kontrak dengan manajemen Persebaya, tepatnya pada Kamis (31/10/2019) lalu.
"Sudah disahkan, jadi dia kan sign kontrak hari Kamis, siang tanda tangan, sore hari sudah disahkan," kata Sekretaris Persebaya, Ram Surahman, kepada Bola.net, Rabu (6/11/2019).
"Karena proses untuk pendaftaran ofisial tidak ada tenggat, bisa kapan pun," imbuh mantan jurnalis salah satu media lokal Surabaya tersebut.
Cepatnya proses pendaftaran Aji Santoso karena tidak membutuhkan banyak persyaratan. Berbeda dengan pelatih sebelumnya, Wolfgang Pikal, yang statusnya pelatih asing, ada banyak dokumen yang harus dilengkapi.
Scroll ke bawah untuk informasi selengkapnya ya Bolaneters.
text:
Aji Santoso Confirmed Live in Debut Persebaya vs Tira Persikabo
Nov 6 2019, 11:16 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persebaya Surabaya's new coach, Aji Santoso, is certain to make his debut in the match against Tira Persikabo, Saturday (9/11/2019). The registration process for the interpreter from Kepanjen, Malang Regency did not encounter any obstacles.
The former Persela Lamongan coach was even immediately legalized by PT Liga Indonesia Baru, a few hours after signing a contract with Persebaya management, precisely on Thursday (10/31/2019) then.
"It was ratified, so he signed the contract on Thursday, signed afternoon, the afternoon was ratified," Secretary of the Persebaya, Ram Surahman, told Bola.net, Wednesday (11/06/2019).
"Because there is no deadline for registering officials, it can at any time," added the former journalist from one of Surabaya's local media.
The Aji Santoso registration process is fast because it does not require many requirements. Unlike the previous trainer, Wolfgang Pikal, whose status is a foreign trainer, there are many documents that must be completed.
Scroll down for more information, Bolaneters.
